attributes.action: GMTV Phone Scam - viewers should be refunded for competition entries made in the last 12 months.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Callers to premium-rate phone competitions on the GMTV breakfast show have been defrauded out of millions of pounds, a BBC investigation has found. I think that GMTV SHOULD refund the all monies people spent by Texting, Phoning and web entries should be fully refunded for the past 12 months.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
